name: roomer
description: ## Purpose: The newcomers in various cities of India donâ€™t have contacts when they arrive and as a result, have difficulty finding roommates to stay at shared rentals at affordable pricing. This issue is faced by professionals and students alike.  We aim to simplify the process of finding roommates.

scripts.setup: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ..
scripts.build: npm install && npm install --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client
scripts.build-run: cd client && npm run build && cd .. && node server.js
